title: Daily limit reached for snowdown chest
body: so yesterday i bought 3 sets of 5 snowdown chests at around 6 am this morning now at 7:30 am and its saying im still at my daily limit to buy chests and not allowing me to make my purchases. im 3 gemstones away from completing a hextech skin and have invested in RP and would very much like to buy a few more from certain snowdown box categories

replies.body: Are you trying to purchase the same sets of chests (5x chests of a certain theme) or are you trying a different set that you haven't purchased before? You can only purchase 6 chests of a specific type per day, so I can only purchase 6x "Batteries Not Included" chests today, but I can purchase 6x of the "Fired Up" chests today without seeing that *daily limit* message.

Now when all the chests are available in the shop, is the counter still reset each day, or can you buy 6, then that's it?

Because me and a buddy bought 6 Batteries chests hunting for Battlecast yesterday, but still have the "Daily limit reached" over them now, 24+ hours later. Just wanna know if we're over with Snowdown for now, or we gotta get another round. :)
this is the issue that im having occur ive purchased 5 chests yesterday at 6 am today at 7:30 i tried to buy 5 more and it says daily limit reached still

I was able to reproduce what you're seeing. I wasn't able to find a workaround, even in the *Legacy Client*, so I recommend posting a report in our [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

Let me know if you have any questions.

I'm having this same problem. I purchased the set of five yesterday, but I can't do the same today as it says I've reached my limit. 

It seems Riot has limited the chests for once the entire weekend, rather than each day. 

Or it's a bug, and their system didn't calculate the sale of yesterday until today. I checked my 'sales receipts' in the client, and it shows everything that happened yesterday, including the opening of the King poro chest and the skin that popped out, with today's date on it. and that's true with the sale of the set of five chests. Strange.
